column4: are there any projects on creating a small adnd usable presentation program for gtk? or OO.o impress is my only choise?
Impress is the only option, sorry... although there is also kpresent if you prefer Qt to java beasts.
for me qt is a beast... having only 2.8 gig HDD and xfce
but thanx anyway.. i only hope that there will be something similar as gnumeric to calc
